workflows.name: dashboards
workflows.label: Dashboards & Visualizations
workflows.description: Dashboards and indices that enable you to easily visualize important metrics.

workflows.name: Go-client
workflows.description: This is a Go-based getting started instructions tutorial

steps.name: Initialize Go Project
steps.label: Project Initialization
steps.description: Initialize a new Go project using go mod init.

steps.name: Add OpenSearch Go Client
steps.label: Client Installation
steps.description: Add the OpenSearch Go client to your project using go get.

steps.name: Create Connection to OpenSearch
steps.label: Connection Establishment
steps.description: Establish a connection to your OpenSearch cluster.

input-params.name: opensearch_host
input-params.description: Hostname or IP address of your OpenSearch server

input-params.name: opensearch_port
input-params.description: Port of your OpenSearch server (default is 9200)

steps.name: Indexing Logs
steps.label: Log Indexing

input-params.name: user_id
input-params.description: User ID associated with the log entry

steps.content:
logEntry := LogEntry{
    Timestamp: "2024-02-05T12:05:00",
    Level:     "info",
    Message:   "Processing user request.",
    Source:    "your_golang_project",
    Module:    "request_handler",
    Function:  "process_request",
    UserID:    "user_123",
}

err = LogToOpenSearch(client, logEntry)
